desc: Created by Barbora Batokova in 2018, FUNGIWOMAN is a photography passion project that fosters learning about mushrooms. Discover the beauty and benefits of fungi, get inspired by mushroom hunting and foraging adventures, and shop for products featuring mushroom photography like greeting cards or calendars.

layout.text: Flavored with sweet paprika, caraway, garlic, and marjoram, this hearty goulash-based soup features crown-tipped coral mushrooms.
